description: Software developer, Team Lead, 13+ years expertise
summary: Full-stack software developer with over 13 years of experience in the web development field. I specialize in software development, IT security, and server management on cloud computing platforms

Experienced backend developer with a solid background in SQL/NoSQL databases and NodeJS/PHP development. Expertise in building scalable and high-performance systems and services to meet a wide range of business requirements

Highly skilled frontend engineer with extensive experience using JavaScript to develop interactive, user-friendly web applications with semantically correct optimized html layouts. Proficient in using modern frameworks and libraries to optimize performance and deliver top-quality products

Lead programmer and project manager with a track record of successfully integrating user and business requirements into cost-effective and secure solutions that scale and are durable. Focused on solving the most complex customer requirements, from conception to successful release
Preferred Environment: AWS, Linux, NodeJS, Typescript, React. Have a basic understanding of Next.js, Go, and Rust, don't have any commercial expertise in these areas
Hobbies: motorcycle, enduro, snowboarding, jet skiing, cooking, animal volunteering
